item.description:
Hi all. I have a hidden agenda with this event; I just became the organizer of another group; Single & the City so I thought we would make this a joint event b/c it will be nice to mingle. It's also my birthday and since my celebrations will be the weekends before and after I thought I would hang with my meetup friends on the actual day-wow I'm gonna be 29 AGAIN!

Hope you can make it and I look forward to seeing everybody!
item.how_to_find_us: I pretty much look like my picture but will email my cell prior to the event. I'll probably be sitting at the bar no doubt!
item.name: Happy hour at Flash's Cocktails
